name: New! Artist Designed Tote Bag
description:
Designed using art work from The Floating World Project, the Floating World Large Tote is made with
environmentally friendly recycled PVC and lined with Cordura fabric and is available in three sizes.
The Skinner and Stevens Large Tote Bag:  18" high 13"wide and 6" deep with three generous inner pockets.  Comes with your choice of zipper or snap.
The Skinner and Stevens Medium Hand Bag: 13" high 9" wide and 6" deep with two generous pockets with a snap.
The Skinner and Stevens wristlet purse:  6" high,11" wide and 2" deep with zipper.
The Skinner and Stevens wine bag:  holds two bottles of wine and an pocket to hold wine gadgets. 
The Skinner and Stevens golf tee bag:  6" high,11" wide and 2" deep holds tees, balls, your keys and phone.
The Skinner and Stevens Dopp Kit:  9"wide by 6"high 3"wide with a  generous side pocket.

name: New!   Golf Tee Bags available in all locations
description:
The Skinner and Stevens Golf Tee Bag clips to your golf bag and  features a zippered lining for extra tees, balls, keys, and your cell phone.  A leather golf tee holder on the front holds 3 tees.
5" high by 6.5" wide, the golf tee bag is available in all locations or customize with a golf course logo, handicap, or initials for your friends, or for a special tournament.   Contact us about golf tournaments.

TO ORDER IN YOUR LOCATION - CLICK ON THE LOCATION-  SCROLL DOWN TO GOLF TEE BAG- ADD TO CART!

(For a custom gift, see custom bags.)

name: As seen in Martha Stewart Living-Large Tote with wristlet (ordered seperately)-Puerto Escondido
description:
Designed using a Nautical Chart, The Puerto Escondido Bag is made out of environmentally friendly recycled PVC and lined with Coradura fabric and is available in three sizes.
The Skinner and Stevens Large Tote Bag:  18" high 13"wide and 6" deep with three generous inner pockets.  Comes with your choice of zipper or snap.
The Skinner and Stevens Medium Hand Bag: 13" high 9" wide and 6" deep with two generous pockets with a snap.
The Skinner and Stevens wristlet purse:  6" high,11" wide and 2" deep with zipper.
The Skinner and Stevens wine bag:  holds two bottles of wine and an pocket to hold wine gadgets. Designed using a Nautical Chart, The Mt. Desert Bag is made out of 
environmentally friendly recycled PVC and lined with Coradura fabric and is available in three sizes.
The Skinner and Stevens golf tee bag:  6" high,11" wide and 2" deep holds tees, balls, your keys and phone.
The Skinner and Stevens Dopp Kit:  9"wide by 6"high 3"wide with a  generous side pocket.

TO ORDER THE WRISTLET IN YOUR LOCATION-CLICK ON LOCATION-SCROLL DOWN TO WRISTLET -ADD TO CART!

name: New!!! Medium Tote Bags : Available in all locations
description:
This hand bag is the perfect size to use during the day as a purse or as an extra small tote.   Like the Larger tote, it has three pockets and is made of recycled pvc and fully lined and finished in sturdy Cordura Fabric. 

TO ORDER IN YOUR LOCATION-CLICK ON LOCATION-SCROLL DOWN TO MEDIUM TOTE BAG -ADD TO CART.

name: New!!! Wine Bag :   Available in all locations
description:
The Wine Tote Bag holds two bottles of wine and has a pocket in the middle for a corkscrew and other gadgets.   Made with the same durable PVC and CORDURA fabric as the Skinner and Stevens Tote Bag, the Skinner and Stevens Wine Bag is made to last and is the perfect gift for the wine lover.   You can order any of the locations available in the Large Tote Bag.

TO ORDER IN YOUR LOCATION-CLICK ON LOCATION-SCROLL DOWN TO WINE BAG-ADD TO CART

name: Customize Your Large Tote Bag:
description:
Choose your location from anywhere in the world and we will custom make a bag for a specific area.  If you want to order more then one of the same location, the additional bags will be standard costs.  Contact us at
skinnerandstevens@gmail.com 
and we get started on your project.

The large Tote Bag is made out of environmentally friendly recycled PVC and lined with Coradura fabric.  The Skinner and Stevens Large Tote Bag is  18" high 13"wide and 6" deep with three generous inner pockets.  Comes with your choice of zipper or snap.

name: Customize your Wine Bag
description:
We will make a customized wine bag with your location.
The Wine Tote Bag holds two bottles of wine and has a pocket in the middle for a corkscrew and other gadgets.   Made with the same durable PVC and CORDURA fabric as the Skinner and Stevens Tote Bag, the Skinner and Stevens Wine Bag is made to last and is the perfect gift for the wine lover.

name: Customize your Medium Tote Bag
description:
Choose your location from anywhere in the world and we will custom make a  medium bag for a specific area.  

This hand bag is the perfect size to use during the day as a purse or as an extra small tote.   The Skinner and Stevens Medium Hand Bag is 13" high 9" wide and 6" deep with two generous pockets with a snap. Like the Larger Tote, it is made with recycled PVC and Coradura Fabric. 

If you want to order more then one of the same location, the additional bags will be standard costs.  Contact us at
skinnerandstevens@gmail.com and we get started on your project.

name: Welcome Shop Owners
description: Welcome shop owners! We happily offer low wholesale prices and a low minimum order to all with a retail sales ID#! Please contact us for a price list and we will get back to you within 24 hours. We have a quick turnaround (generally 2 weeks) for most orders, and are happy to work with you on larger custom orders. Contact us at skinnerandstevens@gmail.com
